Posts.Content: 1MindyydniM1 wrote: I have this upcoming surgery and I have to be honest...I am a bit scared and I feel in shock. I know that in my heart this is my decision but damn..the reality......its actually slapping me in the face! I would like to know what to expect and any advice I could use....like what to take to hospital etc. ANY certain thing people/doctors may have left out. I go on Jan 13 to see my ps to talk about reconstruction...implants..etc.Â  Thanks in advance Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Mastectomy with reconstruction coming up....VERY NERVOUS 1MindyydniM1 Skiergirl
